mapper.sql: id, name, parentId, resKey, type, icon, resUrl, level, description, status, operator, createTime, updateTime, pid
mapper.insert: insert into resources (id, name, parentId, resKey, icon , type, resUrl, level, description, status, operator, createTime, updateTime, pid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
name,
parentId,
resKey,
icon,

mapper.update:
update resources
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resKey = #{reskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resUrl = #{resurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update resources set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resKey = #{reskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resUrl = #{resurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from resources where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and resources.delete_flag = 0

select resources.id as id, resources.name as name, resources.parentId as parentid, resources.resKey as reskey, resources.type as type,resources.icon as icon, resources.resUrl as resurl, resources.level as level, resources.description as description, resources.status as status, resources.operator as operator , resources.createTime as createtime, resources.updateTime as updatetime, resources.pid as pid from resources left join resources_role on resources_role.resc_id=resources.id left join role on role.id=resources_role.role_id
role.role_sign = #{roleSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and resources.delete_flag = 0 and resources.status = 0
ORDER BY resources.parentId, resources.pid , resources.createTime

select
from resources where resources.delete_flag = 0 order by parentId,pid
select max(pid) from resources where parentId = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and resources.delete_flag = 0
select id from resources where parentId = #{rescId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and resources.delete_flag = 0
